body.name: KOHLER K-6669-0 Memoirs Stately Comfort Height 2-Piece Elongated Toilet, 1.28 GPF, White
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: WaterSense is a voluntary label from the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), which identifies products that meet criteria from the EPA for water-efficiency and performance.

features: Comfort Height feature offers chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults; Toilet height without seat: 16.5"
Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort
Concealed trap way and Clean Caps low-profile bolt caps facilitate easier cleaning and enhance design
Standard left-hand Polished Chrome trip lever included. Standard 12 inch rough-in
Combination consists of the K-5626 bowl and the K-4434 tank
Coordinates with other products in the Memoirs collection
Single-flush gravity uses the force of gravity and a precision-engineered tank, bowl, and trap way to create a strong siphon during flushing
Aqua Piston canister allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides (360 degrees), increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush
Flush valve's 3: 2 ratio harnesses the natural force of gravity and optimizes flush performance
Durable canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3-inch flapper, for leak-free performance
body.description: Featuring the elegant architectural look of the Memoirs collection with Stately design, this two-piece toilet combines water-saving flush performance with traditional style. A high-efficiency 1. 28-gallon flush offers up to 16, 500 gallons of water savings per year, compared to a 3. 5-gallon toilet, without compromising performance. The elongated bowl is positioned at a convenient height for comfort and ease of use. A concealed trap way simplifies cleaning. Three-bolt installation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Never Compromise We push flushing power, bowl cleanliness and toilet design to the leading edge. We never compromise. Why should you?

Saving Water Is For The Birds. And fish. And animals. And the future with Kohler water-efficient toilets. Wipe Out Dirt. A clever design reduces the nooks and crannies on the toilet base to make it easy to clean. Kick Your Plunger To The Curb. Kohler’s canister flush valve packs a powerful punch to eliminate clogs without wasting water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You won’t be disappointed!
reviews.reviewText: Very stately toilet. Funny to call a toilet classy, but this one is! The lines of the lid and base of the toilet and tank give it an elegant look. Flushes quickly and rather quietly. Expensive, but worth it to complete bathroom remodel.

reviews.reviewerName: PLS - Bella Donna's MomPLS - Bella Donna's Mom
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Classy & Great Functioning Toilet
reviews.reviewText: Great looking toilet. I love the flat lid on the tank. It is smooth on the sides, as the trap is not visible. So much easier to clean w/o all those nooks & crannies that trap dust. This is in my guest powder room. It also flushes very well and quietly. I couldn’t believe how quiet it is. Not at all like the cheap American Standard it replaced, that continually plugged up. When the plumber arrived and saw it, he said ‘you bought a really fancy one, which is an great choice for guests’. I got the slow closing lid & love that too: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B000TFHN56/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o02_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars the toilet was installed by a plumber
reviews.reviewText: we purchased the toilet on august 19 2020 , we were in the process of having our bathroom redone. we just went to install the toilet on sept 27, 2020 and had noticed the blemish on the side of the toilet. it looks like a factory default that they missed that part with the porcelain, you can see with the picture. we had to install it because our other toilet was already demolished. we had to wait to get the new one out of the box yesterday because we were tiling our bathroom. i know know we had missed the return date but we didn't even open the box till yesterday, because we were doing demolition, and had purchased your very expensive toilet to have on hand. when we were done with the tile. we are very disappointed with the out come of this very expensive toilet, to have opened it and found the big scar on it. i think the factory who packed it missed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant toilet but shipping might require a few tries
reviews.reviewText: This is a very elegant toilet and will improve the look of any bathroom. The flushing mechanism seems very fast - you press the handle and everything disappears. It does not come with a lid, so you will have to buy one. Even the bolts used to secure the toilet to the floor are nice looking! Shipping from Amazon is iffy. I believe these items are meant to be transported in pallets, instead of individual boxes because the packaging from the manufacturer is not very good. It comes in 2 boxes, one for the tank and one for the bowl. The first time I ordered it, the bowl was shattered! I called Amazon customer support and initially they wanted me to send it back (both boxes), so they could send me a replacement. Since the box was damaged, I mentioned I did not have a large enough box. At this point they asked me not to return anything. The second shipment came and this time the tank was shattered! Hence, it took 2 shipments to get one fully functional toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is amazing! I have ruptured discs all through my back and neck. Both knees and shoulders are bad. A also have rheumatoid arthritis. This toilet is beautiful and has been helpful to me. I will eventually buy one for our other bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet, wont solve your Chipotle issues. Eat more fiber.
reviews.reviewText: About the toilet:Its a very nice looking toilet, which is the primary reason I purchased it. It needed to match the 5-panel shaker style door and straight lines in my homes decor. The design and finish are great.I will agree with other commentators that flush handle, while looking good, does feel flimsy, and Kohler could do a better job for a ~$400.00 toilet here.If you have been looking at Memoirs toilets you know that there are about 20 model numbers all stating that they are a Kohler Memoirs toilet. This particular model is unique as it carries the styling design language (of flat straight lines) all the way around the toilet. On most Memoirs toilets, the area where the toilet drains (called the trap) is like all other toilets - its visible and is rounded. On this model the trap (the tube that drains the toilet) is concealed and the toilet appears to have a more "Solid and planted" appearance because of it. Additionally its much easier to clean the exterior of the toilet becuase there are far fewer nooks and crannies for dust and grime to build up.Performance:The toilet is a good performer, it flushes quickly and powerfully without splashing or otherwise creating a lot of noise or drama. It refills quickly, and while it inst silent, is less noisy than most toilets I've encountered when filling.Packaging:When purchased from Amazon.com, the toilet is shipped double boxed and suspended in plastic bag enclosed spray foam. This means that the toilet will arrive to you very well protected and you shouldn't worry about shipping damage on a delicate item. This also means you will have a lot of waste product to dispose of as you will have 4 boxes that can be recycled, but you still will need to throw away the foam and plastic packing materials.Other thoughts: You will need a wax ring and a toilet seat - I found this odd as the image shows a toilet seat with the unit, and its style is unique enough that it seems that there should be a memoirs seat to go with it (included, even). But alas, there is not. You must buy the seat separately. This will bring this toilet to nearly $500.00 if you purchase the Glenburry seat as I did (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000UPSOGW/).Would I purchase this Toilet again?Yes. In fact I replaced my guest bath with another one, and I have two now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liked it so much I bought two
reviews.reviewText: Liked it so much I bought two!Did not come with a seat or a wax ring. Not a problem, because you can buy a high quality seat separately, and the plumber that did my install said the wax rings that come with toilets are often inferior quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 star- elegant- easy to clean - sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: shopped a long time for this perfect toilet! thank you kohler for this great elegant classic design. even tho my bathroom is modern those new style ones don't look good to me. thank you amazon for the free shipping. got it in 2 days!
